name: Crunches
howto: Lie on your back, knees bent; lift shoulders off the floor by contracting abs.

name: Reverse Crunches
howto: Lie on your back, lift legs and hips toward chest, curling lower abs.

name: Flutter Kicks
howto: Lie on back, lift legs slightly, and kick them up and down alternately.

name: Sitting Twists
howto: Sit with knees bent, lean back slightly, twist torso side to side.

name: Knee to Elbow
howto: Lie back, bring opposite knee and elbow together in a crunching twist.

name: Half Wipers
howto: Lie on back, arms out, legs raised; lower legs side-to-side in half arcs.

name: High Crunches
howto: Perform crunches with arms extended overhead while lifting shoulders.

name: Scissors
howto: Lie on back, alternate lifting one straight leg while lowering the other close to the floor.

name: Elbow Plank
howto: Hold plank position resting on forearms, keeping body straight.

name: Cross Crunches
howto: Crunch while bringing shoulder toward opposite knee.

name: Knee-to-Elbow v2
howto: From plank, drive knee forward to touch elbow, keeping hips low.

name: Arm / Leg Raises
howto: From plank, raise opposite arm and leg simultaneously, hold briefly.

name: Sit-ups
howto: Lie back, knees bent; raise torso fully upright, then return down.

name: Leg Raises
howto: Lie flat, lift both straight legs up, lower slowly without touching the floor.

name: L-sit
howto: Sit on floor, lift body with hands beside hips, keeping legs extended straight.

name: Side Jack-knives
howto: Lie on side, lift legs and upper body together, crunching sideways.

name: Dead Bug
howto: Lie on back, extend opposite arm and leg while keeping lower back pressed down.

name: Wipers
howto: Lie on back, arms out, legs raised; lower legs side-to-side in wide arcs.

name: Long Arm Crunches
howto: Crunch with arms stretched straight behind head, moving with torso.

name: Pulse-ups
howto: Legs raised, push hips upward using lower abs in small controlled pulses.

name: Star Plank
howto: Side plank with top leg and arm raised, forming a star shape.

name: Toe Taps
howto: Lie back, knees bent, lift shoulders, reach alternate hands to opposite toes.

name: Plank Crunches
howto: From plank, draw knees toward chest one at a time.

name: Plank Rolls
howto: Elbow plank, roll hips side to side toward floor.

name: Hundreds
howto: Lie on back, legs raised; pump arms up and down while holding core tight.

name: Bicycle Crunches
howto: Crunch while bringing opposite elbow to opposite knee, pedaling legs.

name: Hollow Hold
howto: Lie on back, lift shoulders and legs off floor, lower back pressed down.

name: Sitting Punches
howto: Sit leaning back, core engaged, punch fists alternately across body.

name: Side Plank Crunches
howto: Side plank with top knee pulling toward chest as you crunch.

name: Knee-in Twists
howto: From seated lean-back, draw both knees in then twist side-to-side.

name: Knee Crunches
howto: Crunch while pulling knees in toward chest simultaneously.

name: Crunch Kicks
howto: Lying down, extend legs outward, then pull them back in with a crunch.

name: V-ups
howto: Lie flat, lift legs and torso simultaneously to form a 'V', reaching hands to feet.

name: Side Plank
howto: Support body on one armâ€™s side, hold a straight line position.

name: V with Rotations
howto: Do a V-up, but twist torso at top to target obliques.

name: Climber Taps
howto: From plank, drive knee in and tap opposite elbow.
